titleStmt.title: An elegy upon the Marquess of Dorchester and Earl of Kingston, &c.
titleStmt.author: Crouch, John, fl. 1660-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: and are to be sold by Walter Davis.,

notesStmt.note: Signed: By Jo. Crouch, once his domestick servant.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "If to some silent tomb we laid our ear ..."
Imperfect: A1:1[298] stained with slight loss of text; A4:1[36] stained affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
